description:
OpenAI has announced GPT-4o mini, a small model designed to make AI more accessible and affordable for developers. This new addition to the GPT family promises superior performance at a fraction of the cost of previous models, including the regular GPT-4o . GPT-4o mini still boasts impressive capabilities, scoring 82% on the MMLU benchmark and... Read more »

The post OpenAI slashes AI costs with high-performance GPT-4o mini appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: OpenAI slashes AI costs with high-performance GPT-4o mini
